src:
Balinarke so nadarjene
07 Nov 2019, 15:10 by Simon Maljevac

Balinarski klub Korte že drugo leto zapored v državni ligi v kategorijah do 14 in 18 let tekmuje z ekipama mladink in deklic.



Foto: Simon Maljevac

KORTE > Balinarke se udeležujejo tudi mladinskih kampov, mednarodnih turnirjev ter državnih prvenstev, mladinke pa že nastopajo tudi na državnih prvenstvih za članice. Letošnjo sezono dekleta nastopajo skupaj z mladinci v obalni ligi slovenska Istra z imenom Šola balinanja Korte-Izola.
text:
Balinese women are talented
07 Nov 2019, 15:10 by Simon Maljevac

For the second year in a row in the national league, the Korte Ballroom Club competes with the boys and girls teams in the under 14 and 18 years categories.



Photo: Simon Maljevac

KORTE> Ballinas also participate in youth camps, international tournaments and national championships, and young women are already participating in national championships for members. This season, the girls perform together with the youngsters in the Slovenian Coastal League, named Korte-Izola Bowling School.
